name: Halloween Shooter (VexDev)
description:
Hello and happy halloween!Halloween is here... so i decided to make a little game! I hope you enjoy it ! :DFor each kill you will earn 1 candy! How much candies will you be able to collect before dying?
  • W - Move up
  • S - Move down
  • A - Move left
  • D - Move right
  • SPACE - Shoot

Thanks for viewing the game's page! You can download the game for free down below!
